thread.title: New Ganpati song from Biker’s Adda
thread.title_full: New Ganpati song from Biker’s Adda - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: New Ganpati song from Biker’s Adda
text:
Heading into the 10-day Ganeshotsava festivities, the upcoming youngster-oriented movie 'Biker's Adda' released its new Ganpati song 'Ala re Ala,' as reported by a website.
Giving details about the song, marathistars.com said, "The song is written by Prashant Halve and sung by Jasraj Joshi. The song has slightly western touch and uses electronic guitar in the instruments. The song has been composed by Vishi Nimo, who also has a rock band."
READ: Santosh brings bike on the stage
The song has been picturised on Santosh Juvekar, Shreekant Vattamvar, Rahulraj Dongre, Hrishikesh Mandke. The choreopgrapher is Santosh Palvankar. This song has been shot at Gokhale Nagar Mandal in Pune and the volunteers from this Mandal has also acted in this song.
The film, which is expected to release on October 9, has been directed by Rajesh Latkar and produced by Pramod Lokhande and Vijay Hariya. The film stars Santosh Juvekar, Prarthana Behere, Shreekant Moghe, Shreekant Vattamvar, Rahulraj Dongre, Devendra Bhagat, Tanvi Kishor, Hrishikesh Mandke, Jay Aditya Giri, Aniruddha Harip and Nikhil Rajeshirke.
